title: 如何凭玩家ID获得玩家的SKINME皮肤和正版皮肤呢?

replies.author: kuangwenxin
replies.txt_content:
skimme不可能
但是正版可以有很多途径

replies.author: GenjiKai
replies.txt_content:
/give xxx 397 1 3 {SkullOwner: yy }
给xxxId为YY的人的头

replies.author: 小烦
replies.txt_content:
officeyutong 发表于 2015-2-5 17:06
skinme:http://skins.minecraft.net/MinecraftSkins/玩家名.png
正版http://skins.minecraft.net/Minecraft ...
skinme的是 skinme.cc/MinecraftSkins/<玩家名>.png

replies.author: officeyutong
replies.txt_content:
小烦 发表于 2015-2-5 17:40
skinme的是 skinme.cc/MinecraftSkins/.png
我好像打错了
